name: Drawmation
description:
Have you ever been bored during a math or physics class and start sketching on your notebook ? Dive into a universe imagined by a bored student drawing is own world.

We created Drawmation during the ENSEIRB - MMI 2019 Game Jam in Bordeaux. We won 1st price with this entry.

Drawmation is a 2 player platformer game, the first player control a sketch stickman while the second player can draw platform or wall to help the stickman to pass through world sprinkled with deadly enemies and traps.
